preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 20 g of Cadmium using a digital scale. 
 2. Measure 40 g of Nickel. 
 3. Weigh 10 g of Palladium. 
 4. Weigh 15 g of Scandium. 
 5. Combine all measured metals in a ceramic crucible. 
 6. Stir the mixture thoroughly to ensure even distribution of all elements.
